findings.title: Minting of unlimited number of tokens
findings.description: Smart contract owner can mint tokens after initial contract creation/deployment, allowing for an unlimited number of tokens to be created.

findings.title: Potential unauthorized script upgrade
findings.description: The finding indicates a potential vulnerability where an unauthorized user can upgrade scripts, leading to unintended behavior or security risks.

findings.title: Centralization Risk
findings.description: The smart contract has an active ownership which creates a risk of rug pull scams and centralization hacks.
